verses.verse: Now accept<WG4355> one who is weak<WG770> in faith,<WG4102> but not<WG3361> for<WG1519> disputes<WG1253> over opinions.<WG1261>
<WG3303> One<WG3739> man has faith<WG4100> to eat<WG5315> all things,<WG3956> but<WG1161> he who is weak<WG770> eats<WG2068> only vegetables.<WG3001>

Don't<WG3361> let<WG1848> him who eats<WG2068> despise<WG1848> him who doesn't<WG3361> eat.<WG2068> <WG2532> Don't<WG3361> let<WG2919> him who doesn't<WG3361> eat<WG2068> judge<WG2919> him who eats,<WG2068> for<WG1063> God<WG2316> has accepted<WG4355> him.<WG846>

Who<WG5101> are<WG1488> you<WG4771> who judge<WG2919> another<WG245>'s servant?<WG3610> To his own<WG2398> lord<WG2962> he stands<WG4739> or<WG2228> falls.<WG4098> Yes,<WG1161> he will be made<WG2476> to stand,<WG1063> for God<WG2316> has<WG2076> power<WG1415> to make<WG2476> him<WG846> stand.<WG2476>

One man<WG3739> esteems<WG2919> one day<WG2250> as more<WG3844> important.<WG1161> Another<WG1161> esteems<WG2919> every<WG3956> day<WG2250> alike.<WG4135> Let each man<WG1538> be fully assured<WG4135> in<WG1722> his own<WG2398> mind.<WG3563>

He who observes<WG5426> the day,<WG2250> observes<WG5426> it to the Lord;<WG2962> and<WG2532> he who does not<WG3361> observe<WG5426> the day,<WG2250> to the Lord<WG2962> he does<WG5426> not<WG3756> observe<WG5426> it.<WG2068> He who eats, eats<WG2068> to the Lord,<WG2962> for<WG1063> he gives<WG2168> God<WG2316> thanks.<WG2168> He who doesn't<WG3361> eat,<WG2068> to the Lord<WG2962> he doesn't<WG3756> eat,<WG2068> and<WG2532> gives<WG2168> God<WG2316> thanks.<WG2168>
For<WG1063> none<WG3762> of us<WG2257> lives<WG2198> to himself,<WG1438> and<WG2532> none<WG3762> dies<WG599> to himself.<WG1438>

For<WG1063> if<WG1437><WG99999> we live,<WG2198> we live<WG2198> to the Lord.<WG2962> Or<WG5037> if<WG1437> we die,<WG599> we die<WG599> to the Lord.<WG2962> If<WG1437><WG99999> therefore<WG3767> we live<WG2198> or<WG1437><WG99999> die,<WG599> we are<WG2070> the Lord<WG2962>'s.

For<WG1063> to<WG1519> this end<WG5124> Christ<WG5547> <WG2532> died,<WG599> <WG2532> rose,<WG450> and<WG2532> lived<WG326> again,<WG2443> that he might be Lord<WG2961> of both<WG2532> the dead<WG3498> and<WG2532> the living.<WG2198>

But<WG1161> you,<WG5101> why do<WG2919> you<WG4771> judge<WG2919> your<WG4675> brother?<WG80> Or<WG2228> <WG2532> you again,<WG5101> why do<WG1848> you<WG4771> despise<WG1848> your<WG4675> brother?<WG80> For<WG1063> we will<WG3936> all<WG3956> stand<WG3936> before the judgment seat<WG968> of Christ.<WG5547>

For<WG1063> it<WG1473> is written,<WG1125> <WG1473>"'As I live,<WG2198>' says<WG3004> the Lord,<WG2962> <WG1698> 'to me every<WG3956> knee<WG1119> will bow.<WG2578> Every<WG3956> tongue<WG1100> will confess<WG1843> to God.<WG2316>'"
So<WG686> then<WG3767> each one<WG1538> of us<WG2257> will give<WG1325> account<WG3056> of<WG4012> himself<WG1438> to God.<WG2316>

Therefore<WG3767> let<WG2919>'s not<WG3371> judge<WG2919> one another<WG240> any more,<WG3371> but<WG235> judge<WG2919> this<WG5124> rather,<WG3123> that<WG3588> no man<WG3361> put<WG5087> a stumbling block<WG4348> in<WG80> his brother<WG80>'s way, or<WG2228> an occasion for falling.<WG4625>

I know,<WG1492> and<WG2532> am persuaded<WG3982> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962> Jesus,<WG2424> that<WG3754> nothing<WG3762> is unclean<WG2839> of<WG1223> itself;<WG1487> except<WG3361> that to him who considers<WG3049> anything<WG5100> to be<WG1511> unclean,<WG2839> to him<WG1565> it is unclean.<WG2839>

Yet<WG1161> if<WG1487> because<WG1223> of food<WG1033> your<WG4675> brother<WG80> is grieved,<WG3076> <WG3765> you<WG4043> walk no<WG3765> longer<WG2596> in love.<WG26> Don't<WG3361> destroy<WG622> with<WG1033> your<WG4675> food<WG1033> him<WG1565> for<WG5228> whom<WG3739> Christ<WG5547> died.<WG599>
Then<WG3767> don't<WG3361> let<WG987> your<WG5216> good<WG18> be slandered,<WG987>

for<WG1063> the Kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> eating<WG1035> and<WG2532> drinking,<WG4213> but<WG235> righteousness,<WG1343> <WG2532> peace,<WG1515> and<WG2532> joy<WG5479> in<WG1722> the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit.<WG4151>
For<WG1063> he who<WG1398> serves<WG1398> Christ<WG5547> in<WG1722> these things<WG5125> is acceptable<WG2101> to God<WG2316> and<WG2532> approved<WG1384> by men.<WG444>
So then,<WG3767> let us<WG1377> follow after<WG1377> things<WG3588> which make for peace,<WG1515> and<WG2532> things<WG3588> by which<WG1519> we may build<WG3619> one another up.<WG240>

Don't<WG3361> overthrow<WG2647> God<WG2316>'s work<WG2041> for<WG1752> food<WG1033>'s sake.<WG3956> All things indeed<WG3303> are clean,<WG2513> however<WG235> it is evil<WG2556> for that man<WG444> who creates a stumbling<WG4348> block by<WG1223> eating.<WG2068>

It is good<WG2570> to not<WG3361> eat<WG5315> meat,<WG2907> <WG3366> drink<WG4095> wine,<WG3631> nor<WG3366> do anything by which<WG1722> <WG3739> your<WG4675> brother<WG80> stumbles,<WG4350> is<WG2228> offended,<WG4624> or<WG2228> is made weak.<WG770>

Do you<WG4771> have<WG2192> faith?<WG4102> Have<WG2192> it to<WG2596> yourself<WG4572> before<WG1799> God.<WG2316> Happy<WG3107> is he who doesn't<WG3361> judge<WG2919> himself<WG1438> in<WG1722> that which<WG3739> he approves.<WG1381>

But<WG1161> he who doubts<WG1252> is condemned<WG2632> if<WG1437> he eats,<WG5315> because<WG3754> it isn't<WG3756> of<WG1537> faith;<WG4102> and whatever<WG3956> <WG3739> is not<WG3756> of<WG1537> faith<WG4102> is<WG2076> sin.<WG266> <WG3739> Now<WG1161> to him who is able<WG1410> to establish<WG4741> you<WG5209> according<WG2596> to my<WG3450> Good News<WG2098> and<WG2532> the preaching of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> according<WG2596> to the revelation<WG602> of the mystery<WG3466> which has been kept secret<WG4601> through long<WG5550> ages,<WG166> but<WG1161> now<WG3568> is revealed,<WG5319> and<WG5037> by<WG1223> the Scriptures<WG1124> of the prophets,<WG4397> according<WG2596> to the commandment<WG2003> of the eternal<WG166> God,<WG2316> is made known<WG1107> for<WG1519> obedience<WG5218> of faith<WG4102> to<WG1519> all<WG3956> the nations;<WG1484> to the only<WG3441> wise<WG4680> God,<WG2316> through<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> to whom be the glory<WG1391> <WG1519> forever!<WG165> Amen.<WG281>
